meanings.definition: The emission of light as a result of a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent1: Chemiluminescences can be seen in glow sticks.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study chemiluminescences to understand reactions better.
meanings.sent3: The fireflies put on a chemiluminescences show in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like chemiluminescences in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The chemiluminescences of the stars filled the night sky with beauty.

meanings.definition: The production of light by a chemical reaction without a rise in temperature.
meanings.sent1: Chemiluminescences are used in light sticks for safety.
meanings.sent2: The glow of chemiluminescences is fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The potion created a magical chemiluminescences effect in the cauldron.
meanings.sent4: The city at night was a canvas of chemiluminescences, painting the sky.
meanings.sent5: The underwater world revealed its secrets through the dance of chemiluminescences.
